I have a java class that invokes heritrix from a linux shell. The
command is this "/home/apps/heritrix/bin/heritrix --nowui
/home/apps/heritrix/conf/profiles/Simple/order.xml ". The site is
crawled with no problems, but this process stays stuck indefinitely.
When I ran it manually, I noticed that it would just say 'Starting
Heritrix...', and would keep writing a dot and never stop. My question
is, how do I crawl a site and than once the site is crawled the
heritrix process shuts down. I could have sworn that the same command
use to provide that function, but it seems now it just hangs instead.

-Ahnu
